channel.title: How Do you Un-Zip A ZIPED FILE
channel.description: ok i wanted to download something but its a ziped file how do i un zip it when i open it ,it takes me to word-pad and says this :: Rar!:: please help :confused:

item.title: How Do you Un-Zip A ZIPED FILE
item.dc:creator: @ada ada
item.description:
@ada wrote:

Another zip utility is 7-zip (http://www.7-zip.org)

7-zip can unpack RAR files as well (as well as some other formats)

item.title: How Do you Un-Zip A ZIPED FILE
item.dc:creator: @BobDole81 BobDole81
item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

If the file contents starts with Rar!, then you need WinRAR or another similar archiving utility to extract the files. You can get WinRAR at rarlabs.com - it’s a trial version, but last time I checked it doesn’t prevent you from using it after the 30 day limit, but I’m sure you can find an open source alternative.

If you already have it installed, go to Options>Settings>Integration and choose the filetypes you want to associate WinRAR with.

Read full topic
item.source: How Do you Un-Zip A ZIPED FILE
